Name: statement
column6: the verbatim query string submitted to declare this cursor

Name: is_holdable
column6: true if the cursor is holdable (that is, it can be accessed after the transaction that declared the cursor has committed); false otherwise

Name: is_binary
column6: true if the cursor was declared binary; false otherwise

Name: is_scrollable
column6: true if the cursor is scrollable (that is, it allows rows to be retrieved in a nonsequential manner); false otherwise

Name: creation_time
column6: the time at which the cursor was declared
